Ingredients.1: 1 (1 pound) loaf frozen whole wheat bread dough, thawed

Ingredients.4: 6 ounces deli sliced corned beef, cut into strips

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a large pizza pan.

Directions.2: On a lightly floured surface, roll bread dough out into a large circle about 18-inches in diameter; transfer to the prepared pizza pan. Build up the edges, and prick the center all over with a fork so it doesn't form a dome when baking.

Directions.3: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden.

Directions.4: Spread 1/2 of the salad dressing over hot crust. Sprinkle with 1/2 of the Swiss cheese. Arrange corned beef on top of cheese, then drizzle with remaining salad dressing. Top with sauerkraut and remaining Swiss cheese. Sprinkle with caraway seed.

Directions.5: Bake for another 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until cheese melts and toppings are heated through. Sprinkle with chopped pickle. Let stand for 5 minutes before slicing.
